name: azure-functions-genkit-example
description: Example Azure Functions project using Genkit with Azure OpenAI

scripts.prestart: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.predeploy: cd ../.. && npm run build && cd examples/azure-functions && npm install --install-links && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run predeploy && npx azure-functions-core-tools@4.6.0 azure functionapp publish $npm_config_name
